title: 怎么修改领地插件的圈地范围
author: 狼啸九天
txt_content: {:10_492:}怎么修改领地插件的圈地范围.急求！！！

replies.author: 狼啸九天
replies.txt_content:
616315246 发表于 2014-8-17 10:36
修改配置文件
怎么修改，就是这个不会

replies.author: 颤栗灬帅哥
replies.txt_content:
到\plugins\Residence找到config.yml 往下拉 找到
# The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 999999999
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 999999999
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256
这样改就行了 最高可能是亿

replies.author: a6254814752
replies.txt_content: 加我qq我给你配图教你，采纳一下吧。qq625481475
